function ERI_EP05_20()
    --.エピローグ「ミナトとエリカ」
    SaveData.Title = "ミナトとエリカ"

    --//CG：アキラEND
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV027aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav",0)

    MSG([[ A month has already passed since the fierce battle of the Princess Election. I was walking down the main street of Yuriai Private Academy, where the cherry blossoms were falling, together with Erika. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0937.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “The cherry blossoms will all fall soon. How about we all go to see the flowers this weekend?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1340.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “P-please, no…… I'm already struggling to endure living in a group at the academy on weekdays, you know?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1341.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “At least on our days off, let me play games, lie around, and just be lazy.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0938.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Sorry, sorry. You’re right, Erika. I’ll just laze around with you on the weekends too.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0939.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Even so, it still feels like a dream. That I can come to the academy like this with Erika in my natural face.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1342.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “What are you saying…… You were the one who personally asked the academy, weren’t you? To create a day division for the boys' section too.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0940.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Yeah, that’s true.” ]])

    MSG([[ Having safely become the Princess Emperor, I got the board of directors to approve boys’ participation in some classes as an improvement for the boys' section. ]])

    MSG([[ This year, five new students enrolled in the boys’ section. Not only the highest number ever, but they were also allowed to attend the entrance ceremony alongside the girls’ section. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s still a barrier between the girls’ and boys’ sections, but compared to when we enrolled, the treatment has improved considerably. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0941.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “From now on, while preserving Yuriai Private Academy’s traditions, I hope to lead the academy towards an even better future.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1343.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “As expected of the top ‘Princess,’ the Princess Emperor. You’re fully committed to your duties.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0942.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Ugh… I’m done with cross-dressing already, though.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1344.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Minachin said it before, didn’t you? No matter what form you take, you’re still Minachin. To everyone at the academy, you’re still ‘Princess.’” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1345.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Look, your ‘knights’ are here to greet you.” ]])

    MSG([[ At the end of the main street, the usual group was gathered, waiting for me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0603.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Princess Minato, GGYY~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> I didn’t get the homework yesterday, so teach me.” ]])

--;吉　テキスト修正「交流会」→「交流」（2020/02/03 03:30）
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0396.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Lord Minato, good day. May I have some time to discuss the upcoming exchange between the boys’ and girls’ sections?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Sister Minatoーーーーー! You’re so beautiful today tooー!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0153.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 “Princess Minatoーーーーーーーーーーーーーー!!!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0943.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Haha… Everyone really does still treat me as ‘Princess.’” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0944.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I managed to save Sister Marika, but I still can’t let my guard down.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1346.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Well, let’s take it easy. For humans, not pushing too hard is the best.” ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing Erika’s mischievous smile, I gave a bitter laugh. Though hardships still lie ahead, I think I can manage somehow. ]])

    MSG([[ Because I always have my greatest supporter, who understands me fully, right by my side. ]])

    --//Fin

    -- 20	ボク姫ＰＲＯＪＥＣＴ	もう一度、『エリカ』として生きようと思えた
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(20)

    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(2000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    SystemSaveData.IsClearERI = true

    -- ゲームクリア
    GAME_CLEAR()

    ScenarioManager.Next("")

end
